casebody.data:
DALENKO
v.
COLLIER. No. 274P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 11, 2008. John T. Benjamin, Jr., Raleigh, for Collier.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th day of June 2008 by Plaintiff for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of June 2008."
